source: TEXT_BANAMA005_01221_SEQ_00<tab>Yadovv Gah, in stark contrast to his usual stoic warrior demeanor, appears highly agitated.
target: TEXT_BANAMA005_01221_SEQ_00<tab>Yadovv Gah semble ex<var 16 /var>trê<var 16 /var>me<var 16 /var>ment troublé.

source: TEXT_BANAMA005_01221_SEQ_01<tab>According to Yadovv Gah, it appears that Loonh Gah has embarked on a reckless quest to claim vengeance against Zagozz Teh. Report her absence to Hamujj Gah.
target: TEXT_BANAMA005_01221_SEQ_01<tab>Yadovv Gah vous appris que Loonh Gah a disparu. Allez avertir Hamujj Gah sans attendre.

source: TEXT_BANAMA005_01221_SEQ_02<tab>The warleader seems saddened at Loonh Gah's rash decision, but shows no intention of chasing after her. Convey his words to Yadovv Gah.
target: TEXT_BANAMA005_01221_SEQ_02<tab>Hamujj Gah n'a pas l'air d'avoir envie de partir à la recherche de Loonh Gah. Allez rapporter ses paroles à Yadovv Gah.

source: TEXT_BANAMA005_01221_SEQ_03<tab>After speaking with Yadovv Gah, the distraught Amalj'aa warrior begs you to follow after the impulsive Miqo'te in his stead. Head into Zahar'ak, and find Loonh Gah.
target: TEXT_BANAMA005_01221_SEQ_03<tab>Yadovv Gah vous a supplié<var 08 E905 ((e)) (()) /var> de partir à la recherche de Loonh Gah. Allez au camp de Zahar'ak et retrouvez-la.

source: TEXT_BANAMA005_01221_SEQ_04<tab>You catch up to Loonh Gah, who, after an initial outburst, tasks you with freeing a prisoner being held deeper within Zahar'ak. Locate Blazehorn Monabb Chah, and liberate the cage key.
target: TEXT_BANAMA005_01221_SEQ_04<tab>Loonh Gah vous a confié la mission de délivrer les prisonniers des cellules qui se trouvent au fond de Zahar'ak. Postez-vous <var 33 ((EObj)) 08F61E90220202 /var> et venez à bout de <var 33 ((BNpcName)) 0DF209D00202 /var> pour vous procurer <var 33 ((EventItem)) 03F61E88F10202 /var>.

source: TEXT_BANAMA005_01221_SEQ_05<tab>You have obtained the cage key from Blazehorn Monabb Chah. Use it to unlock the door of the prisoner's cage.
target: TEXT_BANAMA005_01221_SEQ_05<tab>Vous avez vaincu <var 33 ((BNpcName)) 03F209D00202 /var> et obtenu <var 33 ((EventItem)) 03F61E88F10202 /var>. Utilisez-la pour ouvrir <var 33 ((EObj)) 03F61E90200202 /var> de Zahar'ak.

source: TEXT_BANAMA005_01221_SEQ_06<tab>Loonh Gah's reunion with her tempered mother is interrupted by the arrival of a mocking Zagozz Teh. Before setting off in pursuit of the Flamefang leader, the furious Miqo'te requests that you destroy the three Ifrit's beacons found within Zahar'ak.
target: TEXT_BANAMA005_01221_SEQ_06<tab>Loonh Gah est partie à la recherche de Zagozz The. Elle vous a demandé de trouver et détruire les trois piliers du feu sacré qui se trouvent dans l'enceinte du camp. Agissez vite<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_BANAMA005_01221_SEQ_07<tab>You have destroyed Ifrit's beacons. Seek out Loonh Gah that you might stand witness to her confrontation with Zagozz Teh.
target: TEXT_BANAMA005_01221_SEQ_07<tab>Vous avez détruit les trois piliers du feu sacré comme demandé. Retrouvez à présent Loonh Gah au point de rendez-vous.

source: TEXT_BANAMA005_01221_SEQ_08<tab>With the death of Zagozz Teh, Loonh Gah has finally put her years-long vendetta to rest. Return to the Ring of Ash, and speak with Hamujj Gah.
target: TEXT_BANAMA005_01221_SEQ_08<tab>Grâce à votre aide, Loonh Gah a enfin réussi à se venger de celui qui a enlevé sa mère. Retournez à présent au camp de la Ligue des cendres et parlez à Hamujj Gah.

source: TEXT_BANAMA005_01221_SEQ_09<tab>Coupled with the death of their leader, your tireless efforts have ensured that the Flamefangs are no longer a potent force in the lands of Thanalan. Return to the Hall of Flames in Ul'dah, and report to Commander Swift.
target: TEXT_BANAMA005_01221_SEQ_09<tab>Les Crocs de Feu semblent neutralisés pour le moment. Allez à Ul'dah et faites votre rapport au colonel Ryder.

source: TEXT_BANAMA005_01221_SEQ_10<tab>Commander Swift is satisfied that your deeds have freed the people of Thanalan from the constant threat of kidnapping. Though the problems posed by the beastmen are yet many and varied, he bids you enjoy your triumph with a brief respite from the chaos.
target: TEXT_BANAMA005_01221_SEQ_10<tab>Vos actions ont permis de mettre un terme aux enlèvements commis par les Amalj'aa, du moins pour le moment. Zahar'ak redeviendra-t-elle un jour la terre sainte qu'elle aurait dû rester<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_BANAMA005_01221_TODO_00<tab>Speak with Hamujj Gah.
target: TEXT_BANAMA005_01221_TODO_00<tab>Parler à Hamujj

source: TEXT_BANAMA005_01221_TODO_01<tab>Speak with Yadovv Gah.
target: TEXT_BANAMA005_01221_TODO_01<tab>Parler à Yadovv Gah

source: TEXT_BANAMA005_01221_TODO_02<tab>Speak with Loonh Gah in Zahar'ak.
target: TEXT_BANAMA005_01221_TODO_02<tab>Parler à Loonh Gah, au camp de Zahar'ak

source: TEXT_BANAMA005_01221_TODO_03<tab>Lie in wait at the designated location, and obtain the cage key from Blazehorn Monabb Chah.
target: TEXT_BANAMA005_01221_TODO_03<tab>Se poster à l'endroit indiqué et vaincre <var 33 ((BNpcName)) 03F209D00202 /var>

source: TEXT_BANAMA005_01221_TODO_04<tab>Use the cage key to open the sturdy cage.
target: TEXT_BANAMA005_01221_TODO_04<tab>Ouvrir <var 33 ((EObj)) 03F61E90200202 /var> avec <var 33 ((EventItem)) 03F61E88F10202 /var>

source: TEXT_BANAMA005_01221_TODO_05<tab>Destroy Ifrit's beacons.
target: TEXT_BANAMA005_01221_TODO_05<tab>Détruire les piliers du feu sacré

source: TEXT_BANAMA005_01221_TODO_06<tab>Rendezvous with Loonh Gah at the designated location.
target: TEXT_BANAMA005_01221_TODO_06<tab>Retrouver Loonh Gah, au point de rendez-vous

source: TEXT_BANAMA005_01221_TODO_07<tab>Speak with Hamujj Gah at the Ring of Ash.
target: TEXT_BANAMA005_01221_TODO_07<tab>Parler à Hamujj Gah, au camp de la Ligue des cendres

source: TEXT_BANAMA005_01221_TODO_08<tab>Report to Swift at the Hall of Flames in Ul'dah.
target: TEXT_BANAMA005_01221_TODO_08<tab>Faire un rapport à Swift Ryder, à Ul'dah

source: TEXT_BANAMA005_01221_YADOVVGAH_000_001<tab>Loonh Gah is gone! She had no duties that would take her from the camp this day.
target: TEXT_BANAMA005_01221_YADOVVGAH_000_001<tab>Grave est la situation<var 1D /var>! Disparu, Loonh Gah a<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_BANAMA005_01221_YADOVVGAH_000_002<tab>I fear she rides for Zahar'ak, and her chance at Zagozz Teh's head! The warleader must be told!
target: TEXT_BANAMA005_01221_YADOVVGAH_000_002<tab>Son ennemi, Loonh a dû partir traquer en quête de revanche<var 1D /var>! La terre de Zahar'ak, Loonh doit fouler<var 1D /var>! Prévenir notre chef, tu dois im<var 16 /var>mé<var 16 /var>dia<var 16 /var>te<var 16 /var>ment<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_BANAMA005_01221_HAMUJIGAH_000_011<tab>She is gone? The impatient whelp! Reckless action is not martial courage. To charge into battle without certainty of one's self or one's enemy is to court disaster.
target: TEXT_BANAMA005_01221_HAMUJIGAH_000_011<tab>Comment<var 1D /var>!? Quelle folie<var 1D /var>! De l'in<var 16 /var>cons<var 16 /var>cien<var 16 /var>ce et non du courage, la témérité est. Sans connaître son ennemi, sans se connaître soi-même, de se battre il est dangereux.

source: TEXT_BANAMA005_01221_HAMUJIGAH_000_012<tab>Loonh Gah is beyond our help now. This is her battle, and her battle alone. Amalj'aa law forbids intervention in such vendettas.
target: TEXT_BANAMA005_01221_HAMUJIGAH_000_012<tab>Mais intervenir, tu ne dois pas. Celui de Loonh Gah, cet enjeu demeure. Se mêler des affaires per<var 16 /var>son<var 16 /var>nelles des autres, on ne doit pas. Ce précepte, la loi amalj'aa dicte.

source: TEXT_BANAMA005_01221_HAMUJIGAH_000_013<tab>If she wishes to perish in a blaze of false glory, then that is the path she has chosen. Loonh Gah's decisions define her as a warrior, and thus will end her tale.
target: TEXT_BANAMA005_01221_HAMUJIGAH_000_013<tab>Perdre la vie sottement, Loonh Gah va peut-être. Mais le destin que Loonh Gah a choisi, cela est. Une certaine capacité, en tant que guerrier Loonh Gah a. Si son sort est de périr, rien nous ne pouvons y faire.

source: TEXT_BANAMA005_01221_YADOVVGAH_000_020<tab>Hamujj Gah will do nothing!? We have trained Loonh Gah since she was barely more than a hatchling! There must be something we─
target: TEXT_BANAMA005_01221_YADOVVGAH_000_020<tab>C-c-comment<var 1D /var>!? D'une grande froideur, notre chef fait preuve<var 1D /var>! Insensible, cela est<var 1D /var>! Pauvre Loonh Gah...

source: TEXT_BANAMA005_01221_YADOVVGAH_000_021<tab>Honored ally! Though I risk bringing shame upon myself and the Brotherhood, I beg you hear my plea!
target: TEXT_BANAMA005_01221_YADOVVGAH_000_021<tab>Ô puissant<var 08 E905 ((e)) (()) /var> aventuri<var 08 E905 ((ère)) ((er)) /var><var 1D /var>! De venir en aide à Loonh Gah, je te conjure<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_BANAMA005_01221_YADOVVGAH_000_022<tab>As an Amalj'aa, I am bound by our laws and customs...but you are not. Pray follow Loonh Gah into Zahar'ak and see she survives this madness!
target: TEXT_BANAMA005_01221_YADOVVGAH_000_022<tab>Contraire au credo des guerriers amalj'aa, cela est. Mais abandonner notre camarade, je ne peux<var 1D /var>! À Zahar'ak, je veux que tu te rendes<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_BANAMA005_01221_LLOONGAH_001_025<tab>Where are you, Zagozz Teh? Your doom is come!
target: TEXT_BANAMA005_01221_LLOONGAH_001_025<tab>Maudit Zagozz The<var 1D /var>! Où tu te caches<var 1D /var>!?

source: TEXT_BANAMA005_01221_LLOONGAH_001_026<tab>Adventurer!? Why are you here? Did you follow me? I told you, I don't need─ Hmph. Since you <var 1A 02 /var>are<var 1A 01 /var> here, perhaps you can prove useful.
target:
TEXT_BANAMA005_01221_LLOONGAH_001_026)) (( )) 02 /var>!? Mais... que fais-tu là!? Tu as suivi mes trrraces!?
Tu tombes bien, j'ai justement un service à te demander.

source: TEXT_BANAMA005_01221_LLOONGAH_001_027<tab>There is a cage yet deeper within the stronghold. I thought that perhaps...it might be... Well, just free the prisoner, yes?
target: TEXT_BANAMA005_01221_LLOONGAH_001_027<tab>Je me suis rrrendu compte qu'au fond du camp, il y a encore des prisonniers. Est-ce que tu pourrais aller les secourir<var 1D /var>? Il y a peut-être... euh<var 1D /var>! Non, rien, ne fais pas attention.

source: TEXT_BANAMA005_01221_LLOONGAH_001_028<tab>The key is held by Monabb Chah. He is the Flamefangs' second-in-command, and not to be underestimated! Zagozz Teh is mine, but you will have your share of the glory. Now, go!
target: TEXT_BANAMA005_01221_LLOONGAH_001_028<tab>Ap<var 16 /var>parr<var 16 /var>rem<var 16 /var>ment, c'est <var 33 ((BNpcName)) 02F209D00202 /var> qui a la clef de la cellule. Attention car c'est un ennemi redoutable<var 1D /var>! Moi, je pars à la recherche de Zagozz The<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_BANAMA005_01221_LLOONMOTHER_000_031<tab>(-White-haired Miqo'te-)Who is it? Who's there!?
target: TEXT_BANAMA005_01221_LLOONMOTHER_000_031<tab>(-Miqo'te aux cheveux bleu clair-)Qu... Qui va là<var 1D /var>!? Qui êtes-vous<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_BANAMA005_01221_LLOONMOTHER_000_032<tab>(-White-haired Miqo'te-)St-Stay back! You stay away!
target: TEXT_BANAMA005_01221_LLOONMOTHER_000_032<tab>(-Miqo'te aux cheveux bleu clair-)Non<var 1D /var>! N'apprrrochez pas<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_BANAMA005_01221_LLOONMOTHER_000_033<tab>(-White-haired Miqo'te-)I know why you're here! Filthy kidnappers! You've come for my little Loonh, haven't you!?
target: TEXT_BANAMA005_01221_LLOONMOTHER_000_033<tab>(-Miqo'te aux cheveux bleu clair-)C'est... c'est vous qui commettez ces enlèvements, n'est-ce pas<var 1D /var>? Vous êtes venus me prrrendre ma chère Loonh<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_BANAMA005_01221_LLOONMOTHER_000_034<tab>(-White-haired Miqo'te-)Well, you can't have her! No one can have her! She's been promised to the Lord of the Inferno!
target: TEXT_BANAMA005_01221_LLOONMOTHER_000_034<tab>(-Miqo'te aux cheveux bleu clair-)Cette enfant est destinée à être sacrrrifiée au grand Ifrit<var 1D /var>!! Vous ne l'aurez pas<var 1D /var>! Je ne vous laisserai jamais me la prendre<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_BANAMA005_01221_LLOONMOTHER_100_034<tab>(-White-haired Miqo'te-)Ahahaha! Ahahahahahaha!
target: TEXT_BANAMA005_01221_LLOONMOTHER_100_034<tab>(-Miqo'te aux cheveux bleu clair-)Ha ha ha ha ha<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_BANAMA005_01221_LLOONGAH_000_035<tab>Mother!? You're alive!
target: TEXT_BANAMA005_01221_LLOONGAH_000_035<tab>M... Maman<var 1D /var>!? Tu étais vivante<var 1D /var>!?

source: TEXT_BANAMA005_01221_LLOONMOTHER_000_036<tab>(-White-haired Miqo'te-)Who is that? No! No, I know you people-snatchers and your dirty tricks! Now, get out before you scare my little Loonh! Out! Out, I said!
target: TEXT_BANAMA005_01221_LLOONMOTHER_000_036<tab>(-Miqo'te aux cheveux bleu clair-)Qui est là<var 1D /var>? Vous aussi, vous êtes là pourrr enlever des innocents<var 1D /var>? Partez<var 1D /var>! Ma petite Loonh va pleurrrer<var 1D /var>! Partez tout de suite<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_BANAMA005_01221_LLOONGAH_000_037<tab>Gods, no...
target: TEXT_BANAMA005_01221_LLOONGAH_000_037<tab>M-Maman...

source: TEXT_BANAMA005_01221_ZAGOZZTHE_000_038<tab>Gahahaha! There is naught quite as touching as the reunion betwixt mother and child. I can scarce contain my tears of bittersweet joy!
target: TEXT_BANAMA005_01221_ZAGOZZTHE_000_038<tab>Har har har, dans de drôles de cir<var 16 /var>cons<var 16 /var>tan<var 16 /var>ces la mère et l'enfant se retrouvent après cinq ans<var 1D /var>! Des larmes, ces émouvantes retrouvailles vont me faire verser<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_BANAMA005_01221_LLOONGAH_000_039<tab>Zagozz Teh! You'll pay for what you've done to her...and to me!
target: TEXT_BANAMA005_01221_LLOONGAH_000_039<tab>Zagozz The<var 1D /var>! Ordure... Parrr ta faute, elle est...<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_BANAMA005_01221_ZAGOZZTHE_000_040<tab>Some of the tempered, such as this one, are exposed overlong to the sacred flame. They become the walking witless, barely aware of their own existence!
target: TEXT_BANAMA005_01221_ZAGOZZTHE_000_040<tab>L'influence du feu sacré, cette subjuguée a subi pendant trop longtemps. La raison même, elle a perdu<var 1D /var>! Un cadavre vivant sans volonté, elle est devenue.

source: TEXT_BANAMA005_01221_ZAGOZZTHE_000_041<tab>Is Lord Ifrit's power not magnificent? Come, now. It is time you were purified in the raging blaze of His blessing!
target:
TEXT_BANAMA005_01221_ZAGOZZTHE_000_041Ha ha ha! Le pouvoir du feu sacré de notre Dieu, cela est!
Qu'il nous accorde sa protection!

source: TEXT_BANAMA005_01221_LLOONGAH_000_042<tab>Come back and face me, coward!
target: TEXT_BANAMA005_01221_LLOONGAH_000_042<tab>Pas si vite<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_BANAMA005_01221_LLOONGAH_000_043<tab>I go now to put an end to that monster's abominations once and for all. But if I'm to have any chance of victory, I will need you to first destroy Ifrit's beacons. Honor and pride, adventurer.
target: TEXT_BANAMA005_01221_LLOONGAH_000_043<tab>Je veux me venger de cette raclure<var 1D /var>! Il faut que tu détrrruises les piliers du feu sacré qui se trouvent dans le camp<var 1D /var>! Si tu y arrives, alors nous aurons une chance de vaincre<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_BANAMA005_01221_ZAGOZZTHE_000_061<tab>Gahahaha! You are as a lost kitten that has wandered into the drake's lair. Surrender this doomed vendetta. Submit to Ifrit's will...as your mother did before you!
target: TEXT_BANAMA005_01221_ZAGOZZTHE_000_061<tab>Ha ha ha<var 1D /var>! Dans notre antre, un chaton s'est égaré. Le baptême du feu sacré, tu vas recevoir<var 1D /var>! Un de nos esclaves, tu deviendras alors... comme ta pauvre mère<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_BANAMA005_01221_LLOONGAH_000_062<tab>Hah!
target: TEXT_BANAMA005_01221_LLOONGAH_000_062<tab>Yah<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_BANAMA005_01221_ZAGOZZTHE_000_064<tab>Argh, the pain! How is this possible!? My spells are drawn from the searing furnace of Ifrit's might!
target: TEXT_BANAMA005_01221_ZAGOZZTHE_000_064<tab>M-m-mais que<var 1D /var>? Comment<var 1D /var>? Mon pouvoir... Disparu, mon pouvoir a<var 1D /var>! Pourquoi<var 1D /var>!?

source: TEXT_BANAMA005_01221_LLOONGAH_000_065<tab>Wrong. Your power was drawn from the beacons, and those altars of suffering are no more!
target: TEXT_BANAMA005_01221_LLOONGAH_000_065<tab>La sourrrce de tes pouvoirs, ce sont les flammes des piliers disséminés dans le camp<var 1D /var>! Une fois éteints, vous ne bénéficiez plus de la protection d'Ifrit<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_BANAMA005_01221_LLOONGAH_000_066<tab>Without your precious blessing, there's naught to protect you from the sting of my arrows!
target: TEXT_BANAMA005_01221_LLOONGAH_000_066<tab>Sans l'aura de votre Primordial, vous n'êtes que de faibles Amalj'aa orrrdinaires... Inaptes à se mesurer au guerrier que je suis<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_BANAMA005_01221_ZAGOZZTHE_000_067<tab>M-Mercy! Mercy, I beg you! The will of our god is overwhelming! Spare my life, and I shall become your slave instead!
target: TEXT_BANAMA005_01221_ZAGOZZTHE_000_067<tab>Aaaaah<var 1D /var>!! Pitié<var 1D /var>! Miséricorde<var 1D /var>!! Me tuer, il ne faut pas<var 1D /var>!! Pitié<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_BANAMA005_01221_LLOONGAH_000_068<tab>Pitiful creature. If any bring shame to the Amalj'aa, Zagozz Teh, then it is you.
target: TEXT_BANAMA005_01221_LLOONGAH_000_068<tab>C'est lamentable... Tu n'es pas un fierrr guerrier amalj'aa<var 1D /var>! Tu n'es qu'un misérable lézard rampant dans la poussière<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_BANAMA005_01221_LLOONGAH_000_069<tab>Your power is broken and my vengeance complete─no more of my arrows need be stained by your coward's blood. Crawl back under your rock, lizard!
target: TEXT_BANAMA005_01221_LLOONGAH_000_069<tab>J'ai accompli mon but. Je ne compte pas salirrr davantage mes flèches avec ton sang répugnant. Hors de ma vue, lézard<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_BANAMA005_01221_ZAGOZZTHE_000_070<tab>Gahahahahahaha! Gullible fool! Die!
target: TEXT_BANAMA005_01221_ZAGOZZTHE_000_070<tab>Ha ha ha ha ha<var 1D /var>! Un sot, celui qui baisse sa garde face à son ennemi est<var 1D /var>! Meurs<var 1D /var>!!

source: TEXT_BANAMA005_01221_ZAGOZZTHE_000_071<tab>Arrrgh!
target: TEXT_BANAMA005_01221_ZAGOZZTHE_000_071<tab>Aaaaaaarh<var 1D /var>!!

source: TEXT_BANAMA005_01221_LLOONGAH_000_072<tab>Warleader!
target: TEXT_BANAMA005_01221_LLOONGAH_000_072<tab>Chef<var 1D /var>!!

source: TEXT_BANAMA005_01221_HAMUJIGAH_000_073<tab>You forsook all that is sacred to a true warrior of the Amalj'aa, Zagozz Teh. For your cowardice and cruelty, the only reward is death!
target:
TEXT_BANAMA005_01221_HAMUJIGAH_000_073Zagozz The! L'honneur des guerriers amalj'aa, tu as oublié! Notre fierté, tu souilles!
La mort et l'oubli, le seul destin qui attend les pleutres de ton espèce est!

source: TEXT_BANAMA005_01221_HAMUJIGAH_000_074<tab>I beheld the entire confrontation, Loonh Gah.
target: TEXT_BANAMA005_01221_HAMUJIGAH_000_074<tab>Ô Loonh Gah<var 1D /var>! Ton combat, j'ai observé.

source: TEXT_BANAMA005_01221_HAMUJIGAH_000_075<tab>You fought with honor, and with courage! Such was my proud exultation, the dagger flew unbid from my hand─how unfortunate, then, that Zagozz Teh stood in its path. It appears that perfect martial detachment yet eludes even me...
target: TEXT_BANAMA005_01221_HAMUJIGAH_000_075<tab>Une in<var 16 /var>ter<var 16 /var>ven<var 16 /var>tion inutile, j'ai engendré. Par mon affection, mon jugement a été obscurci. De maturité, je manque aussi. Longue, la route vers la puissance suprême est.

source: TEXT_BANAMA005_01221_LLOONGAH_000_076<tab>Were you watching, Mother? You have been avenged.
target: TEXT_BANAMA005_01221_LLOONGAH_000_076<tab>Maman... Tu as vu<var 1D /var>? J'ai réussi... enfin<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_BANAMA005_01221_HAMUJIGAH_000_081<tab>With the Flamefangs defeated, the Amalj'aa within Zanr'ak will return to cowering behind their campfires.
target: TEXT_BANAMA005_01221_HAMUJIGAH_000_081<tab>Anéanties, les ambitions des Crocs de Feu sont. S'apaiser, l'ardeur des Amalj'aa de Zanr'ak va.

source: TEXT_BANAMA005_01221_HAMUJIGAH_001_081<tab>And though the embers of Ifrit's blessings yet smolder, we shall fight that fire with the flames we ourselves nurture─a strength born from within!
target:
TEXT_BANAMA005_01221_HAMUJIGAH_001_081Encore incandescente, l'étincelle qui anime le Dieu des flammes reste cependant. Une force capable de dépasser sa protection, nous devrons faire nôtre.
Le chemin vers la puissance suprême, ceci est.

source: TEXT_BANAMA005_01221_HAMUJIGAH_000_082<tab>But I need not speak to you of strength, for you, perhaps more than any, have neared the peak of perfection. You have earned the highest praise and deepest gratitude of my people.
target:
TEXT_BANAMA005_01221_HAMUJIGAH_000_082Ô puissant aventuri! Tes exploits, nos frères conteront à présent. Avec le plus grand respect, nous te traiterons.
Un véritable guerrier sur la voie de la puissance suprême, tu es.

source: TEXT_BANAMA005_01221_HAMUJIGAH_000_083<tab>Even should our races clash in blood-drenched savagery, you, honored ally, will always be welcomed by the Brotherhood of Ash.
target: TEXT_BANAMA005_01221_HAMUJIGAH_000_083<tab>Pavé de conflits et souillé par le sang, le chemin des hommes et des Amalj'aa est. Cependant, <var 08 E905 ((la)) ((le)) /var> bienvenu<var 08 E905 ((e)) (()) /var> au sein de la Ligue tu seras toujours. Un lien entre nos races, la Ligue est.

source: TEXT_BANAMA005_01221_LLOONGAH_000_084<tab>I have seen my mother safely to Forgotten Springs.
target: TEXT_BANAMA005_01221_LLOONGAH_000_084<tab>J'ai rrramené ma mère à l'Oasis oubliée.

source: TEXT_BANAMA005_01221_LLOONGAH_000_085<tab>It is unheard of for tempered to ever recover from their primal-induced madness, but it is my hope that she will at least find a measure of peace in our old home...
target: TEXT_BANAMA005_01221_LLOONGAH_000_085<tab>Les subjugués ne peuvent jamais redevenirrr comme avant, mais... être au calme parmi les siens lui fera du bien. Du moins, je l'espère.

source: TEXT_BANAMA005_01221_LLOONGAH_000_086<tab>Oh, and a word with you, adventurer.
target: TEXT_BANAMA005_01221_LLOONGAH_000_086<tab>Ah, et au fait, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>...

source: TEXT_BANAMA005_01221_LLOONGAH_000_087<tab>I questioned your resolve, and you have answered me as well as any Amalj'aa warrior would. You have my respect...
target:
TEXT_BANAMA005_01221_LLOONGAH_000_087Je dois bien le reconnaîtrrre: tu es le guerrier le plus fort que j'aie jamais rencontré.
Et je compte sur toi pour le rester! Tu n'as pas intérêt à te laisser vaincre à l'avenir, hein?

source: TEXT_BANAMA005_01221_LLOONGAH_000_089<tab>...and my thanks.
target: TEXT_BANAMA005_01221_LLOONGAH_000_089<tab>Et puis... Je dois te rrremercier.

source: TEXT_BANAMA005_01221_LLOONGAH_000_090<tab>Well, this feels strange. I─ Why are you staring?
target: TEXT_BANAMA005_01221_LLOONGAH_000_090<tab>... Ha ha, j'ai pas l'habitude de ce genrrre de trucs.

source: TEXT_BANAMA005_01221_LLOONGAH_000_091<tab>I cannot help the way I look! My brethren must think me hideous!
target: TEXT_BANAMA005_01221_LLOONGAH_000_091<tab>Rah<var 1D /var>! Pas la peine de rrricaner<var 1D /var>! Je sais bien que j'ai l'air bête<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_BANAMA005_01221_HAMUJIGAH_000_092<tab>The road calls you, honored ally!
target: TEXT_BANAMA005_01221_HAMUJIGAH_000_092<tab>De partir, il est temps pour toi.

source: TEXT_BANAMA005_01221_HAMUJIGAH_000_093<tab>Though misfortune seeks to waylay us, let us not stray from the path of the strong!
target: TEXT_BANAMA005_01221_HAMUJIGAH_000_093<tab>L'infortune et la douleur, nous ne craignons pas. Partir sans crainte, tu peux. Ton chemin sur la voie de la force suprême, tu dois poursuivre.

source: TEXT_BANAMA005_01221_LLOONGAH_000_095<tab>My thirst for vengeance is satisfied, but it is too late for me to leave the Brotherhood. I am too steeped in Amalj'aa custom, my skin too stained with ash.
target: TEXT_BANAMA005_01221_LLOONGAH_000_095<tab>Même si j'ai assouvi mon désirrr de vengeance, je vais rester ici. J'ai trop l'habitude du mode de vie amalj'aa, maintenant<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_BANAMA005_01221_LLOONGAH_000_096<tab>Fare you well, adventurer. May victory follow in your footsteps!
target: TEXT_BANAMA005_01221_LLOONGAH_000_096<tab>Adieu, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>. Je compte surrr toi pour ne jamais connaître le goût amer de la défaite.

source: TEXT_BANAMA005_01221_HAMUJIGAH_000_097<tab>Your deeds have been etched within the chambers of my soul, honored ally. Though the road might call you onwards, may the strength you have gained with the Brotherhood serve you well in the battles to come!
target: TEXT_BANAMA005_01221_HAMUJIGAH_000_097<tab>Ô puissant<var 08 E905 ((e)) (()) /var> aventuri<var 08 E905 ((ère)) ((er)) /var><var 1D /var>! Tes exploits, j'ai gravé dans ma mémoire. L'heure de partir, il est. Que la gloire illumine ton chemin, je souhaite.

source: TEXT_BANAMA005_01221_SWIFT_000_101<tab>Commander Gisilbehrt submitted a detailed report, <var 08 E1E93501 ((<var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>)) ((<var 08 E1E93601 ((<var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>)) ((<var 2B ((<var 08 E1E93501 ((<var 28 ((GCRankLimsaMaleText)) E93509 /var>)) (()) /var><var 08 E1E93601 ((<var 28 ((GCRankGridaniaMaleText)) E93609 /var>)) (()) /var><var 08 E1E93701 ((<var 28 ((GCRankUldahMaleText)) E93709 /var>)) (()) /var>)) /var> <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 03 /var>)) /var>)) /var>. It seems my decision to assign you this duty was the correct one.
target: TEXT_BANAMA005_01221_SWIFT_000_101<tab>Ah, Gisilbehrt m'a fait part de vos exploits. Je vous félicite, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>. J'ai bien fait de vous confier cette mission.

source: TEXT_BANAMA005_01221_SWIFT_000_102<tab>With the Amalj'aa fanatics thus quelled, Thanalan may enjoy a measure of peace for a time.
target: TEXT_BANAMA005_01221_SWIFT_000_102<tab>Maintenant que cette histoire de rapts est réglée, le Thanalan devrait connaître une période de tran<var 16 /var>quil<var 16 /var>li<var 16 /var>té.

source: TEXT_BANAMA005_01221_SWIFT_000_103<tab>And though we are never in short supply of beastman-related problems, I believe you've earned a respite from the chaos. Enjoy the rest while you may, <var 08 E1E93501 ((<var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>)) ((<var 08 E1E93601 ((<var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>)) ((<var 2B ((<var 08 E1E93501 ((<var 28 ((GCRankLimsaMaleText)) E93509 /var>)) (()) /var><var 08 E1E93601 ((<var 28 ((GCRankGridaniaMaleText)) E93609 /var>)) (()) /var><var 08 E1E93701 ((<var 28 ((GCRankUldahMaleText)) E93709 /var>)) (()) /var>)) /var> <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 03 /var>)) /var>)) /var>.
target: TEXT_BANAMA005_01221_SWIFT_000_103<tab>Profitons de cette accalmie, avant que de nouveaux problèmes liés aux tribus barbares ne se présentent.

source: TEXT_BANAMA005_01221_POP_MESSAGE<tab>You sense a hostile presence!
target: TEXT_BANAMA005_01221_POP_MESSAGE<tab>Vous ressentez une présence hostile<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_BANAMA005_01221_SYSTEM_200_000<tab>You have achieved <var 48 F201F4 /var><var 49 F201F5 /var>Trusted<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var> reputation with the Brotherhood of Ash.
target: TEXT_BANAMA005_01221_SYSTEM_200_000<tab>Votre réputation auprès des Amalj'aa de la Ligue des cendres est passée à “Estimé”. Grâce à vos actions, vos relations avec les membres de la tribu s'améliorent de jour en jour.

source: TEXT_BANAMA005_01221_SYSTEM_200_001<tab>Furthermore, you now have access to a wider selection of wares from the Brotherhood of Ash vendor.
target: TEXT_BANAMA005_01221_SYSTEM_200_001<tab>Le vendeur amalj'aa vous propose maintenant les objets correspondant au rang “Estimé”.
